name: Hexachains
description:
Hexachains is a puzzle game similar to Tetris where the goal is to create chains of 3 or more hexagons of the same color.

Unlock more levels by gaining stars, you receive 1 to 3 stars for each level depending on your score.

There is a bonus mode to receive another stars per level, the goal in this one is to create the longest chain you can.

The Game :
- link 3 or more hexagons of the same color together
- Hexagons that are not link to one of the starting point will disappear (and count as more points)
- Use left and right arrow to rotate the platform- Press "space" to accelerate Hexagons
- 15 levels

How to make more points :
Each Hexagon that explode at the same time will have a value of 5 more points, ex :
>> explode 3 hexagons = 5 + 10 + 15 = 30
>> explode 5 hexagons = 5 + 10 + 15 + 20 +25 = 75

Platforms: Windows only for moment.
